description:
Socks that take you from trailhead to summit, whether that's 2k or multiday. A high proportion of nylon ensures they stand up to hike after hike, with plenty of merino content to keep your feet cool in the heat and warm when it's cold.

  • Merino blend naturally thermoregulates temperature and resists odours
  • High-density cushioning underfoot for all-day comfort in hiking boots
  • Instep, ankle and achilles support prevents bunching and provides a performance fit
  • Reinforced heel and toe adds durability
  • Breathable ventilation zones improve temperature control
  • Seamless toe for bulk- and chafe-free wear
name: icebreaker Hike+ Light Mini Socks - Men's
